entry.name: AstraMilitarum/LanceChargeDescription
entry.value: Charges the enemy line with lances. Disengage if possible.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianOfficersDontDuckDescription
entry.value: Inspired by the bravery of their officers, Praetorians gain morale and accuracy. Weaker-willed troops lose morale.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianOfficersDontDuckFlavor
entry.value: "They couldn't hit an elephant at this range."
